message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a small share to keep things friendly.
Let's split it 50/50, a fair and reasonable offer!
You're not getting the best deal, but I'm willing to give you a decent chunk. Don't expect more!
You're being too stingy, I think I deserve more. I'll give you a chance to reconsider.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not budging on the price. Take it or leave it!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'm getting serious. You're not getting away with this easy!
Fine, I'll give you 50/50, but don't think this is a sign of weakness. I'm just trying to end this quickly.
